Payment

If you use a credit card we do not charge the core charge up front.

We hold onto your credit card number and if you do not return the core within 30 days we will automatically charge your account.

In addition to credit cards we accept:

  • Postal money orders (Prepay including the core charge)
  • Company Checks (Prepay including the core charge, from auto related businesses with resale number)
  • Net 30 accounts (For large volume customers and municipalities, credit application available upon request)
